verses.verse: <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> is not <S%H7114>shortened,<s%> that it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3467>save;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H3513>heavy,<s%> that it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H8085>hear:<s%>

But your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H914>separated<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and your <S%H430>God,<s%> and your <S%H2403>sins<s%> have <S%H5641>hid<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from you, that he will not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

For your <S%H3709>hands<s%> are <S%H1351>defiled<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and your <S%H676>fingers<s%> with <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> your <S%H8193>lips<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H8267>lies,<s%> your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> has <S%H1897>muttered<s%> <S%H5766>perverseness.<s%>

<S%H369>None<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> for <S%H6664>justice,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> any <S%H8199>pleads<s%> for <S%H530>truth:<s%> they <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H8414>vanity,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>lies;<s%> they <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H5999>mischief,<s%> and <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>

They <S%H1234>hatch<s%> <S%H6848>cockatrice'<s%> <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> and <S%H707>weave<s%> the <S%H5908>spider's<s%> <S%H6980>web:<s%> he that <S%H398>eats<s%> of their <S%H1000>eggs<s%> <S%H4191>dies,<s%> and that which is <S%H2116>crushed<s%> <S%H1234>breaks<s%> out into a <S%H660>viper.<s%>

Their <S%H6980>webs<s%> shall not <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H3680>cover<s%> themselves with their <S%H4639>works:<s%> their <S%H4639>works<s%> are <S%H4639>works<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and the <S%H6467>act<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> is in their <S%H3709>hands.<s%>

Their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and they make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity;<s%> <S%H7701>wasting<s%> and <S%H7667>destruction<s%> are in their <S%H4546>paths.<s%>

The <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> they <S%H3045>know<s%> not; and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> in their <S%H4570>goings:<s%> they have made them <S%H6140>crooked<s%> <S%H5410>paths:<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H1869>goes<s%> therein shall not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> is <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from us, <S%H3808>neither<s%> does <S%H6666>justice<s%> <S%H5381>overtake<s%> us: we <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H2822>obscurity;<s%> for <S%H5054>brightness,<s%> but we <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H653>darkness.<s%>

We <S%H1659>grope<s%> for the <S%H7023>wall<s%> like the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> and we <S%H1659>grope<s%> as if we had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> we <S%H3782>stumble<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%> day as in the <S%H5399>night;<s%> we are in <S%H820>desolate<s%> places as <S%H4191>dead<s%> men.

We <S%H1993>roar<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> like <S%H1677>bears,<s%> and <S%H1897>mourn<s%> sore like <S%H3123>doves:<s%> we <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> but there is <S%H369>none;<s%> for <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> but it is <S%H7368>far<s%> off from us.

For our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>multiplied<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> you, and our <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H6030>testify<s%> against us: for our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are with us; and as for our <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> we <S%H3045>know<s%> them;

In <S%H6586>transgressing<s%> and <S%H3584>lying<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5253>departing<s%> away from our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H6233>oppression<s%> and <S%H5627>revolt,<s%> <S%H2029>conceiving<s%> and <S%H1897>uttering<s%> from the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood.<s%>

And <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is <S%H5253>turned<s%> away <S%H268>backward,<s%> and <S%H6666>justice<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off: for <S%H571>truth<s%> is <S%H3782>fallen<s%> in the <S%H7339>street,<s%> and <S%H5229>equity<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H935>enter.<s%>

Yes, <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5737>fails;<s%> and he that <S%H5493>departs<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%> makes himself a <S%H7997>prey:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, and it <S%H7489>displeased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> him that there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

And he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H8074>wondered<s%> that there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6293>intercessor:<s%> therefore his <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3467>brought<s%> <S%H3467>salvation<s%> to him; and his <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> it <S%H5564>sustained<s%> him.

For he <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> as a <S%H8302>breastplate,<s%> and an <S%H3553>helmet<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> on his <S%H7218>head;<s%> and he <S%H3847>put<s%> on the <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> for <S%H8516>clothing,<s%> and was <S%H5844>clad<s%> with <S%H7068>zeal<s%> as a <S%H4598>cloak.<s%>

<S%H5921>According<s%> to their <S%H1578>deeds,<s%> <S%H5922>accordingly<s%> he will <S%H7999>repay,<s%> <S%H2534>fury<s%> to his <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> <S%H1576>recompense<s%> to his <S%H341>enemies;<s%> to the <S%H339>islands<s%> he will <S%H7999>repay<s%> <S%H1576>recompense.<s%>

So shall they <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> and his <S%H3519>glory<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun.<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H6862>enemy<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> in like a <S%H5104>flood,<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5127>lift<s%> up a <S%H5127>standard<s%> against him.

And the <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and to them that <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H6588>transgression<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

As for me, <S%H2063>this<s%> is my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> My <S%H7307>spirit<s%> that is on you, and my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>put<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> nor out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> nor out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed's<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> from now <S%H3254>on<s%> and for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
